body: What is the units of your document. This example file generates test points for every 4 units of the document. You can also connect the output from [testPts](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Radiation_Analysis&slide=0&scale=3.1748022830221068&offset=-2220.1823902755946,-537.4412083177772) to a point collector to see the test points or check the number of test points.
